long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with Pyrum application to do more with your smartphone, This extension allows you to connect your browser with our Pyrum mobile application and send any links to read on your mobile phone or send a video or audio that you are watching in your browser to your mobile to enjoy the portability in your mobile. The video or audio will be played from where you left on your browser. For example if you are watching a youtube video now you want to watch it in your mobile with simple on click you can send the YouTube video to your mobile, you can do this on any website.
